scripts.install-ci: echo '# No additional dependencies need to be installed in ci mode'
scripts.install-dev: echo '# Installing all libraries on host for code editor support. TODO how to minimize as --only=dev affects devDepencies also?' && npm run install-all
scripts.install-all: npm-run-all install-all:admin install-all:bot install-all:client install-all:server install-all:worker
scripts.install-all:admin: if [ -d admin ]; then cd admin && npm install && npm run types-install; fi
scripts.install-all:bot: if [ -d bot ]; then cd bot && npm install && npm run types-install; fi
scripts.install-all:client: if [ -d client ]; then cd client && npm install && npm run types-install; fi
scripts.install-all:server: if [ -d server ]; then cd server && npm install && npm run types-install; fi
scripts.install-all:worker: if [ -d worker ]; then cd worker && npm install && npm run types-install; fi
scripts.taito-init:local:clean: npm run taito-init:clean && npm run clean:storage
scripts.clean:storage: if [ -d storage ]; then echo Cleaning storage; rm -rf ./storage/bucket/*; rm -rf ./storage/.minio.sys/buckets/bucket/*/; fi
scripts.info:local: taito secrets | grep 'Showing\|PASSWORD'; echo; echo 'TODO: add local users to package.json (username/password)'
scripts.info:dev: taito secrets:dev | grep -A 1 'Showing\|user.'; echo; echo 'TODO: add dev users to package.json (username/password)'
scripts.info:test: taito secrets:test | grep -A 1 'Showing\|user.'; echo; echo 'TODO: add test users to package.json (username/password)'
scripts.lint: echo Running lint locally && npm-run-all --parallel lint:admin lint:bot lint:client lint:server lint:worker
scripts.lint:admin: if [ -d admin ]; then cd admin && npm run lint; fi
scripts.lint:bot: if [ -d bot ]; then cd bot && npm run lint; fi
scripts.lint:client: if [ -d client ]; then cd client && npm run lint; fi
scripts.lint:server: if [ -d server ]; then cd server && npm run lint; fi
scripts.lint:worker: if [ -d worker ]; then cd worker && npm run lint; fi
scripts.unit: echo Running unit tests locally && npm-run-all --parallel unit:admin unit:bot unit:client unit:server unit:worker
scripts.unit:admin: if [ -d admin ]; then cd admin && npm run unit; fi
scripts.unit:bot: if [ -d bot ]; then cd bot && npm run unit; fi
scripts.unit:client: if [ -d client ]; then cd client && npm run unit; fi
scripts.unit:server: if [ -d server ]; then cd server && npm run unit; fi
scripts.unit:worker: if [ -d worker ]; then cd worker && npm run unit; fi
scripts.test: npm-run-all test:admin test:bot test:client test:server test:worker
scripts.test:admin: if [ -d admin ]; then taito util-test:${taito_env} admin; fi
scripts.test:bot: if [ -d bot ]; then echo DISABLED taito util-test:${taito_env} bot; fi
scripts.test:client: if [ -d client ]; then taito util-test:${taito_env} client; fi
scripts.test:server: if [ -d server ]; then taito util-test:${taito_env} server; fi
scripts.test:worker: if [ -d worker ]; then echo DISABLED taito util-test:${taito_env} worker; fi
scripts.analyze:admin: if [ -d admin ]; cd admin && npm run analyze; fi
scripts.analyze:client: if [ -d client ]; cd client && npm run analyze; fi
scripts.project-contacts: cat PROJECT.md | sed -n -e '/^## Contacts.*$/,/^#.*$/{ /^## Contacts.*$/d; /^#.*$/d; p; }'
scripts.docs: echo TODO: generate docs in package.json
scripts.scan: echo 'Linting is executed in Dockerfiles during build' && echo 'TODO: execute code analysis here?'
scripts.precommit: echo 'SKIP: Skipping linting on commit since we are already continuously linting during development.'
scripts.types: if [ -f .flowconfig ]; then flow; elif [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then echo TODO run typescript; fi
scripts.disabled-types: echo flow/typescript check disabled on prepush
